author: lightclient
content: <@!393119312350543872> what fork flag are you running under? so far only `state.fork=aleut` supports 1559 txs, i can `london` now if that is how you're running it

content: Ah. State fork is yolov3

author: dimitry8570
content: also the eip1559 change is mandatory?  meaning no legacy block can be accepted after and no legacy transaction either ?

author: lightclient
content: no legacy blocks after eip1559, but yes legacy txs

author: lightclient
content: legacy txs are interpreted as 1559 txs where priorityFee == maxFee == gasPrice
